segments.text: I can't help but feel angry about the neglect in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clearly overflowing, creating a dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is going to be a huge problem for these cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is just standing there, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such avoidable hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, risking a fall for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable stool is an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can so much chaos be unfolding right under an adult's nose?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I look out the window, and the garden is pristine and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark, almost infuriating contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic order is crumbling inside, while outside is perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and alert everyone to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a perfect storm of unawareness and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It fills me with a sense of unease and outright indignation.
segments.speaker: PAR
